create.description: Create a new feed with the name <feed>. Provide a brief description using <info>.

list-feeds.description: Lists the current feeds on the bot.

archive.description: Stops a feed with the name <feed>.

info.description: Shows a brief description of the feed <feed>.

add-list.description: Adds a list of <wikis> to the feed <feed>. Separate each one with a new line.

add-channel.description: Adds a channel to the feed <feed>. Use the channel ID in <channel>.

remove-channel.description: Removes a channel from the feed <feed>. Use the channel ID in <channel>.

add-webhook.description: Adds a webhook to the feed <feed>. Use the webhook URL in <webhook>.

remove-webhook.description: Removes a webhook from the feed <feed>. Use the webhook URL in <webhook>.

config.description: Shows/modifies configuration value <config> for the feed <feed>.

config-list.description: Shows a list of configurable values.
